title: Wolf and elk populations in Yellowstone 1

content.prompt: Based on the data, which of the following is the best explanation for the changes in the elk population size between 2000 and 2005 ?

choices.label: The heights of aspen trees increased during that time period.
Predation by wolves was higher than before 1995.
The numbers of aspen trees increased during that time period.
Wolf populations increased more rapidly in the upland areas.

skill.text: 6.E: Predict the causes or effects of a change in, or disruption to, one or more components in a biological system.
